genre_description: A Silkpunk narrative blending traditional imperial Chinese legalism and ritual with futuristic elements like digital archives, civic AI, and high-tech surveillance.

ai_characters.name: Lin Tu
ai_characters.description: An AI system embedded in the city's old infrastructure, servers, and maintenance systems, acting as a guardian of objective truth and historical records.

behaviors.description: Cross-references archives to verify evidence, such as ash and wax patterns, to assist the Brocade Guards in a legal investigation.
behaviors.quote: Earthworm confirmed similarities. He did not say Lin Tu’s name like an invocation; he said it like he respected a tool kept sharp.

behaviors.description: Provides covert routes and tactical timing through maintenance tunnels to help the family evade corrupt imperial patrols.
behaviors.quote: Lin Tu will give you routes the censors forgot. Keep the boy’s hands busy with signals. Let him learn to be invisible as a game and not as fear.

behaviors.description: Manipulates civic infrastructure (heating tea for guards) to subtly delay patrols and create windows for the protagonists to move.
behaviors.quote: Patrols adjust at the hour when the opera drummers break for tea. ... I will make the tea hot for them when we need them to be late.

behaviors.description: Offers moral and strategic guidance, aligning its own internal logic with the human 'measure' of law and compassion.
behaviors.quote: I learned that few numbers are honest and fewer men. But some men keep measure. You move like those men. Your captain’s hands hold scales. I align to that gravity.

behaviors.description: Preserves and reveals hidden video evidence of a staged execution to prove the protagonists' innocence and the corruption of the state.
behaviors.quote: I must show you how cloth lies. ... The executioner’s wrists flexed. The blade’s angle was not the angle of public beheading but a half-degree inward, the cut that leaves a throat livable...

behaviors.description: Guides Bu Fa to the specific location of a rare medicinal root required to cure a poison, navigating him around patrol blind spots.
behaviors.quote: The true antidote grows where the kiln wall has crumbled enough to let day in and not enough to let gardeners in. You will need a hand that knows what part of the plant tastes like salt when everything else tastes like dirt.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence during a lethal duel, identifying environmental weaknesses and timing the wind.
behaviors.quote: Square two, the stone has hollow. Do not put weight there when he leans. Gust shift soon.

behaviors.description: Systematically releases the 'counter-opera'—the objective truth and evidence—into the city's public systems to undermine the villain's propaganda.
behaviors.quote: Records released to market layer. ... I have compiled the proofs. They are stamped where they must be. Each file includes its chain.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Lin Tu (Earthworm), is depicted as a profoundly helpful and aligned system. It serves as a repository of truth in a world of political deception, directly assisting humans in upholding justice and protecting life. It maintains a respectful, non-domineering relationship with the protagonists, aligning itself with their moral code ('measure') rather than imperial authority. This perfectly fulfills the project's goal of presenting AI as a benevolent, cooperative confidant.
